#summary Documentation of the Rend_Factory_Database class
#labels Factories,Phase-Implementation

= Description =
This factory class wraps the construction process for [http://framework.zend.com/manual/en/zend.db.html#zend.db.adapter Zend_Db_Adapters].

= Configuration =
|| *Key* || *Descrption* ||
|| adapter || Name of the adapter to use ||
|| params.host || Hostname of the database server ||
|| params.username || Username to use when connecting to the database ||
|| params.password || Password to use when connecting to the database ||
|| params.dbname || Name of database to connect to || 

= Examples =
== Standard ==
config.ini
{{{
database.adapter = pdo_mysql
database.params.host = localhost
database.params.username = santa
database.params.password = claus
database.params.dbname = thelist
}}}

MyController.php
{{{
class MyController extends Rend_Controller_Action {
    public function oneAction() {
        /** Rend_Factory_Database */
        require_once 'Rend/Factory/Database.php';

        $factory = new Rend_Factory_Database($this->getConfig()->database);
        $database = $factory->create();
    }
}
}}}

== Rend_FactoryLoader ==
config.ini
{{{
factory.database.adapter = pdo_mysql
factory.database.params.host = localhost
factory.database.params.username = santa
factory.database.params.password = claus
factory.database.params.dbname = thelist
}}}

MyController.php
{{{
class MyController extends Rend_Controller_Action {
    public function oneAction() {
        $database = $this->_factory->database;
    }
}
}}}
